mapper.select: SELECT ASSET_CODE, ASSET_NAME, ASSET_CATEGORY FROM TBL_ASSET
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_RESERVATION WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode }

SELECT A.RESERVATION_NO, A.ASSET_CODE, B.ASSET_NAME, C.MEMBER_NAME, A.TEAM, A.DESCRIPTION, DATE_FORMAT(A.START_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i') AS START_TIME, DATE_FORMAT(A.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %k:%i') AS END_TIME, DATE_FORMAT(A.RESERVATION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS RESERVATION_DATE FROM TBL_RESERVATION A JOIN TBL_ASSET B ON A.ASSET_CODE = B.ASSET_CODE JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON A.MEMBER_CODE = C.MEMBER_CODE WHERE A.MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } LIMIT #{ selectCriteria.startRow }, #{ selectCriteria.limit }

SELECT A.RESERVATION_NO, A.ASSET_CODE, B.ASSET_NAME, C.MEMBER_NAME, A.TEAM, A.DESCRIPTION, DATE_FORMAT(A.START_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS START_TIME, DATE_FORMAT(A.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS END_TIME, DATE_FORMAT(A.RESERVATION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS RESERVATION_DATE FROM TBL_RESERVATION A JOIN TBL_ASSET B ON A.ASSET_CODE = B.ASSET_CODE JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON A.MEMBER_CODE = C.MEMBER_CODE WHERE A.RESERVATION_NO = #{ reservationNo }

SELECT A.RESERVATION_NO, A.ASSET_CODE, B.ASSET_NAME, C.MEMBER_NAME, A.TEAM, A.DESCRIPTION, DATE_FORMAT(A.START_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS START_TIME, DATE_FORMAT(A.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS END_TIME, DATE_FORMAT(A.RESERVATION_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS RESERVATION_DATE FROM TBL_RESERVATION A JOIN TBL_ASSET B ON A.ASSET_CODE = B.ASSET_CODE JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON A.MEMBER_CODE = C.MEMBER_CODE WHERE A.ASSET_CODE = #{ assetCode } AND A.START_TIME >= #{ startTime } AND A.END_TIME <= #{ endTime }
SELECT MEMBER_NAME, TEAM FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_RESERVATION (ASSET_CODE, MEMBER_CODE, TEAM, DESCRIPTION, START_TIME, END_TIME, RESERVATION_DATE) VALUES (#{ assetCode }, #{ memberCode }, #{ team }, #{ description }, #{ startTime }, #{ endTime }, #{ reservationDate })
